description:
A durable, lightweight roller bag that's ready for some serious adventure. The Hugger Roller Bag offers a smooth journey to your far-off destination. Burly materials and ABS ribs are tough enough to withstand being tossed around on baggage carousels.

  • Large main compartment opens fully for easy access to all your gear
  • Ergonomic retractable handle for optimal manoeuvrability
  • Rib Cage Technology™ uses strong ABS ribs to add structure and protect your belongings even if half empty
  • Hook-Up System™ fully integrates with any backpack for hassle-free transport
name: Db Bags Hugger 60L Roller Bag
